005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ISource;
010
011import java.util.Collection;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015public interface IConstraintSet {
016  /**
017   * Get information about where the constraint set was sourced from.
018   *
019   * @return the source information
020   */
021  @NonNull
022  ISource getSource();
023
024  /**
025   * Get the constraints in the constraint set that apply to the provided module.
026   *
027   * @param module
028   *          a Metaschema module
029   * @return an iterator over the constraints that target the module
030   */
031  @NonNull
032  Iterable<ITargetedConstraints> getTargetedConstraintsForModule(@NonNull IModule module);
033
034  /**
035   * Get constraint sets imported by this constraint set.
036   *
037   * @return the imported constraint sets
038   */
039  @NonNull
040  Collection<IConstraintSet> getImportedConstraintSets();
041}
